aparadhakaruwan athadanguwata ganime daksha kirthimath niladhariyaku wu mathara kottasa dushana mardana anshaye kosthapal (4930) waligama liyanaaarachchige sunil (33) ha ohuge biriya ghathanaya kala siddhiye dewani sakakaru polisiya samanga eeye(22) aluyama athiwu wedi huwamaruwaka di maranayata pathwa thibe.mese miya gos aththe ghathana athulu wiwidha aparadha rasakata sambandha yuda hamudawe sewayen pala aa sebalaku wu hakmana miwalla, badabadda pradeshaye padinchi wa siti thishawiridi amith priyadarshana namaththaku bawa polisiya pawasiya.ghathanaya wu polis niladhariwaraya 2001 wasare wishesha karya balakayata ekwa kachchimarukulam ha konduwattuwan wani ewakata anarakshathawa pawathi pradeshawala sewaya kara pasuwa polis departhamenthuwe rajakariwalata ekwa wiwidha pradesha wala sewaya karamin aparadha madima ha nithiya saha samaya aaraksha kirima wenuwen nithigaruka lesa katayuthu kala ayeki.dakunu palathe wadima mathdrawya thogaya athadanguwata ganime meheyumatada ekwa athi mohu bandhanagaraye sita randawiyaku meheyawana kudu jawaramak da heli kara ganimata samath wiya.

kotakethana pradeshaye mawak saha diyaniyak amanushika lesa kapa kota ghathanaya kirima sambandhayen chodana kara athadanguwata gena rakshitha bandhanagara gatha karana lada sakakariya wasara hayahamarakata pasu nidos kota nidahas karana lesa adhikaranaya wisin niyoga kara athi bawa wartha we.

me samagama mage asthamenthuwe hatiyata dolar 500,000 ka pamana mudalak da me pa්rasangaya magin masa kihipayak thula di rate aarthikayata ekathu we.
ewani watapitawak thula the karmanthaya mulkara ganimin maha parimana jawaram jalayak ka්riyathmaka wana athara warin wara ee pilibanda madhya magin janathawa danuwath karathi.
me prathishatha tike danatama chanda prathipala liyawila thiyenne.

lasith malinga saha thisara pererage birindawarun athara samaja madhya thula siduwu bawa pawasena matha gatuma shri lanka pile nawasilantha sancharaya atharathura dadi kathabahata lakwiya.ee pilibanda nawatha kathabahata lakwa thibenne ee sambandhayen thisara perera shri lanka krikat aayathanayata yomu kala lipiyak madhya wetha nikuth wimath samagaya.”ekdina krikat nayaka lasith malingage birinda thama ilakka karaganimin samaja madhya thula pala kara athi chodana gana” thisara perera ema lipiya magin aprasadaya palakara thibe.wisheshayenma kandayame samagiyata eya dadi badhawak ella kara athi bawa pawasana thisara perera ema thaththwaya nawathwimata shri lanka krikat aayathanaye madihathwima balaporoththuwana bawa kiya siti.lasith malingage nayakathwaya da thisara perera wisin wiwechanayata lak karanu laba athi athara kandayame samagiya athikirima sandaha nayakathwaya dimata lasith malinga apohosathwu bawa ohu sandahan karayi.
jathikathwaya matha padanam wu fedaral rajyak wu indiyawa pilibanda nisi deshapalana awabodhayak bahutharayak shri lankikayinta athi bawak dakinnata natha .

pura pasaloswaka pohoya dinaya subha katayuthu sadaha sudusulesa bauddhayan sithima sadharanaya manda thiloguru buduradun pawa pura pasaloswaka thithiya thama diwiye wishesha katayuthu sadaha yoda gaththe nam pruthagjanayan wana apata edina asubha wanne kesedayi gataluwak pana nagina bawini.namuth mehidi wisheshayen salakiya yuthu karuna wanne buddha charithaye pawa edina siduwi aththe laukika subha katayuthu walata wada lokoththara katayuthu bawayi.enam buddha charithaye ipadima,abhinishkramanaya, buduwima,palamu dharma deshanaya,piriniwima wani da misa nam thabima,akuru kiyawima,wiwahaya wani katayuthu sadaha pura pasaloswaka dina yeduna bawa sadahan wi natha.

woltar dayarathna anuradhapura disa wisheshashyamopali maha nikaye malwathu parshwaye uthuru madhyama disawe pradhana sanghanayaka atamasthanadhipathi aacharya pallegama siriniwasa nahimiyan ge anushasana matha, gowijana sewa departhamenthuwa magin sanwidhanaya karana lada 2013 aluth sahal mangalyaya jathika uthsawaya ape්ral 03 –04 yana dedina thula anuradhapura jaya shri maha bo samindun abhiyasa di pawathwe.ape්ral 03 wana dina perawaru 6.00 ta jaya shri maha bo samindun wethata buddha pujawa piliganwa perawaru 7.00 ta sathara wahalkada kiri ithirawima sidu kere.edina paswaru 6.00 ta bo samindun wethata thel mal pahan athulu gilanpasa pujawa pawathwa rathri 7.30 ta swarnamali chaithya rajayanan wetha nelum mal pujawakda pawathwimen anathuruwa maha bo samindun abhiyasadi sarwarathrika pirith deshanawa aarambha we.pasudina perawaru 6.00 kiriaahara pujawa bo samindun abhiyasadi pawathwa mahawihara shalawedi maha sangaruwanata hil danaya pirinamanu atha.diwayine disthrik wisipaha (25) ma niyojanaya karamin paminena gowi sanwidhanawala gowi gewiliyan aluth sahal pathra ragath darshaniya maha perahara perawaru 7.30 anuradhapura sinhakanuwa asalin aarambha kara shri maha bodhi mawatha osse paminena perahara bosamindunge nagenahira wahalkada abhiyasadi uthurumada palath aandukara karunarathna diwulgane pradhana amathya ranjith samarakon adhyapana sewa katayuthu amathya duminda disanayaka niyojya amathyawarun wana es.em. chandrasena dabliw.
